snippet: Roger Federer’s schedule ends with multiple interviews conducted in several languages that can last hours, sometimes longer than his matches.
abstract: Roger Federer’s schedule ends with multiple interviews conducted in several languages that can last hours, sometimes longer than his matches at the United States Open.
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer’s schedule ends with multiple interviews conducted in several languages that can last hours, sometimes longer than his matches.

headline.seo: Roger Federer Takes On News Media Interviews Like Pro
headline.main: Federer Is Busiest After the Match
headline.print_headline: Federer Is at His Busiest After His Match Is Over
